title: Design Matters From the Archive: Clement Mok
description: Debbie talks to designer Clement Mok about the early days of Apple computer, the heady days of the software bubble, and the joys of working for Steve Jobs.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to designer Clement Mok about the early days of Apple computer, the heady days of the software bubble, and the joys of working for Steve Jobs.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
itunes:author: Debbie Millman
itunes:summary: Debbie talks to designer Clement Mok about the early days of Apple computer, the heady days of the software bubble, and the joys of working for Steve Jobs.
